span.em: Building Families and Communities Through Education

div.p: Does your child attend our school? Click here to view helpful information for current families!
Are you interested in Weston Academy? Click here for information about our school!

Weston Preparatory Academy will facilitate and encourage educators, family, community and business partners to contribute to the education of our students utilizing academic skills, creativity, and technology.
